name: Guinea Pig Cages DIY Small Animal Playpen with Waterproof Liner, Expandable Cage for Guinea Pigs, Metal Wire Yard Fence Rabbit Cage
short_description: Protective Liner – This guinea pig cage is designed with a waterproof liner placed outside the frame, effectively preventing pets from chewing and ensuring long-lasting use.
Secure Hook Connection – The liner attaches with hooks, keeping it stable while making removal and reinstallation simple. Smart design makes cleaning your rabbit cage faster and easier.
Convenient Door Opening Design – The waterproof liner includes a reserved space for the cage door, allowing it to open smoothly so pets can freely enter and exit without obstruction.

Customizable Layout – Create the perfect habitat with freely connectable panels. Whether you need a spacious guinea pig cage, a compact rabbit cage, or an expandable bunny cage, the modular design adapts to your space and your pet’s needs.

Multi-Pet Friendly – Ideal not only as a guinea pig cage but also as a rabbit cage, or even a small pet playpen. A versatile choice for families seeking a secure and cozy home for their furry companions.

name: Chew-Resistant Acrylic Hamster Cage, Large Habitat with Enhanced Safety Lock System for Syrian & Dwarf Hamsters, Gerbils, Mice, Includes Full Accessory Set - 18" x 11.8" x 14.6"
short_description: 【360° CHEW-RESISTANT BUILD】Stop worrying about escape artists! Unlike standard acrylic cages that can be damaged by persistent chewing, our hamster habitat is constructed with a reinforced, durable build. This 360-degree chew-resistant design ensures your pet stays securely housed, providing peace of mind and long-lasting value.

【ENHANCED TRIPLE-LOCK SECURITY】Your pet's safety is our priority. This cage features a comprehensive anti-escape system, including a top door safety hook, a secure escape buckle, and a reinforced structural design. This multi-point protection is engineered to keep even the most curious Syrian hamsters and gerbils safely inside their home.

【PANORAMIC VIEW & SUPERIOR VENTILATION】Enjoy crystal-clear views of your pet's daily life from every angle. The panoramic transparent shell allows for intimate observation and bonding. Our enhanced ventilation system provides superior airflow compared to standard designs, ensuring a consistently fresh and odor-controlled environment for your furry friend.

【ALL-IN-ONE STARTER KIT】Everything you need is in the box! This habitat comes complete with a full set of accessories: a cozy European-style wooden house, a leak-proof food bowl, an 18cm oversized silent wheel, an external bathing area, a no-drip water bottle, and a wooden bridge. It’s the perfect, fully-equipped home for Syrian hamsters, dwarf hamsters, gerbils, or a small group of mice.

【EFFORTLESS LIFT & CLEAN DESIGN】Maintenance is a breeze. The entire cage features a modular design with a fully detachable chassis. Simply lift the main structure for quick, unrestricted access to the base for thorough cleaning and bedding changes. The large top-opening door also makes daily interaction and spot-cleaning quick and effortless.

name: Clear Acrylic Hamster Cage, Dwarf Hamster Cage, Mouse Cage, Gerbil Cage - All-in-One Hamster Habitat with 18cm Silent Wheel, Tubes & Full Kit, 17.7×11.8×13" for Dwarf Hamsters, Mice, Gerbils
short_description: Panoramic View & Comfortable Ventilation-This hamster cage habitat is crafted from high-quality, transparent PP material, offering an unobstructed view of your pet's adorable activities. The scientifically designed ventilation system ensures optimal airflow and prevents condensation, creating a healthy and comfortable living environment for your small animal.

Complete Accessory Set & Fun Exploration-Everything your pet needs for a joyful life is included: a hideout house, elevated platform, food bowl, connecting staircase, and an extra-large 7-inch (18cm) silent exercise wheel designed for quiet operation. The clear tubes encourage natural exploring and burrowing instincts, keeping your pet curious and engaged.

External Expansion & Easy Maintenance-Features specially designed ports for attaching an external sand bath (sand not included) to promote natural grooming and keep the main habitat clean. The internally mounted water bottle attaches securely to the enclosure wall, preventing spills and allowing for easy water level monitoring and refilling. Paired with the removable deep-base plastic tray, daily cleaning is quick and effortless.

Secure Design & Cozy Retreat-The interior includes an entrance hideout that provides a dark, private space for rest, satisfying their instinct to burrow. Paired with a stable platform and non-slip stairs, it creates a fun multi-level exploration route. All structures feature smooth rounded edges and are made from safe, non-toxic materials to prevent injury and ensure your pet's complete security.

Worry-Free Support & Considerate Note-Xiylon is committed to ensuring your complete satisfaction. If you have any questions during assembly or use, please contact our customer service for assistance. Friendly reminder: For optimal transparency, please remove the protective film from both sides of the acrylic panels before installation.

short_description: 【Includes Accessories & Toys】This acrylic hamster cage encompasses everything needed for pet care. It features 2 wooden garden houses, a connecting tube for accessing the upper and lower levels, catering to your hamster's natural digging instincts. Inside the mice cage, you'll find a food bowl, a ladder, an extra-large 18cm exercise wheel, a bridge toy, an external bathing area, and a water bottle equipped with a steel ball to prevent leaks. This makes it an ideal gift choice, especially for kids.

【Unique Roof Design, Strong Magnetic Connection Buckle】The garden roof features a unique design with a powerful magnetic lock that allows for easy removal—simply lift it off. This makes cleaning hassle-free.

【Transparent Hamster Playpen】The transparent hamster enclosure is made from high-transparency acrylic material, allowing you to observe every adorable move of your little companion. The all-clear walls provide an unobstructed view, letting you explore their charming world. Additionally, this material is more durable and easier to clean, offering great convenience and extended longevity.

【Easy Interaction & Cleaning】The easy-access front door design allows for convenient interaction with your small animals. The detachable lock at the bottom enables effortless separation of the upper and lower halves for thorough cleaning and bedding replacement.

【Combines Beauty and Practicality】Our hamster house cage is made from thick wood and adorned with unique garden villa stickers, ensuring your pet enjoys a natural living experience while also guaranteeing long-term use.

【Fun Assembly】This hamster cage comes as separate acrylic panels with all necessary hardware. We include step-by-step instruction manual, and you can also access our detailed assembly video for visual guidance. Make it a bonding experience—building it together with your child turns setup into a delightful family activity!

【Important Note】Please remember to remove the protective film from both sides of the acrylic panels before installation. And,our customer support team is always ready to assist you with any assembly questions.
